alert.note: Alert for Smith; Upshur; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 2:26AM CDT until June 16 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN SMITH...SOUTHERN WOOD AND SOUTHWESTERN UPSHUR COUNTIES... At 226 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mineola, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Quarter size hail was just reported 2 miles north of Mineola at 220 AM. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mineola, Quitman, Big Sandy, Hawkins, Hoard, Hainesville, Winona, Red Springs and Pritchett. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
